LanguageData.Bullet_MechanoidMultiTurret.label: High Velocity Charge
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidMultiTurret.label: Mechanoid Multi Burst
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidMultiTurret.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made to sieve through approaching combat forces with its superior firepower. Has high velocity fastcharger guns with an adaptive AI target system attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret.
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidMultiTurretEnhanced.label: Mechanoid Multi Burst Enhanced
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidMultiTurretEnhanced.descrip: Evolved defense building, primarily made to sieve through approaching combat forces with its superior firepower. Has high velocity fastcharger guns with an adaptive AI target system attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Upgraded.
LanguageData.MPC_MechanoidMultiTurret.label: Mechanoid Multi Burst
LanguageData.MPC_MechanoidMultiTurret.description:
A tank turret with a Quadgun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.
Needs Plasteel to repair.
Evolved defense building, primarily made to sieve through approaching combat forces with its superior firepower. Has high velocity fastcharger guns with an adaptive AI target system attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Can be upgraded.
